camera_gear.model: Phase One XF IQ4 150MP / Hasselblad X2D 100C / Canon EOS R5
camera_gear.lens: Tilt-Shift Wide-Angle TS-E 35mm f/2.8L / PC-E Micro-NIKKOR 45mm f/2.8D ED
camera_gear.sensor: Medium Format 150MP BSI CMOS / Full-frame 45MP stacked sensor

lighting_setup.time_of_day: Civil Twilight transitioning to Blue Hour, approximately 30-45 minutes post-sunset
lighting_setup.weather: Clear sky with residual ambient light, high atmospheric clarity
lighting_setup.lighting_direction: Soft diffused residual skylight from zenith mixed with warm interior illumination from building apertures
lighting_setup.quality: Soft, diffused, low-contrast twilight ambient with punctuated warm interior glows creating focal points
lighting_setup.artificial_light: Warm interior residential lighting (2700-3000K) glowing through windows, street-level commercial/reception lighting, subtle facade uplighting on ground floor

color_grading.palette: Split-tone palette: cool cyan-blue twilight sky (5500-6000K) contrasting against warm amber interior lights (4700K), transitioning to light gray/white upper floors, autumn foliage hints
color_grading.saturation: Medium saturation (80-85%), natural color rendering with selective emphasis on interior warmth against cool exterior
color_grading.contrast: Medium contrast with lifted shadows for street detail preservation, smooth tonal transitions between sky and building, controlled highlights in window lights

texture_quality.details: Glass with reflections, glass transparency showing interior activity
texture_quality.surface_descriptions: Clear glazing with warm interior glow, dense urban foliage in mist

composition_guide.type: Three-point perspective corner view from across street, eye-level pedestrian perspective

atmosphere.mood: Sophisticated urban residential tranquility, dialogue between contemporary architecture, welcoming domestic warmth emanating from lit windows
atmosphere.feeling: Gentle evening transition, rooted elegance, neighborhood integration, quiet metropolitan living, seasonal autumn ambiance

technical_quality.post_processing: Tilt-shift perspective correction for perfect verticals, exposure blending for interior/exterior balance, selective color grading emphasizing split-tone effect (cool shadows/warm highlights), clarity enhancement on facade materials, subtle shadow lifting for street-level detail, chromatic aberration control on high-contrast window edges
technical_quality.white_balance: Dual white balance technique: exterior balanced to 6000K preserving blue hour atmosphere, interior lighting allowed warm rendering at 2800K creating natural color temperature contrast and depth
technical_quality.tone: Blue hour tonal curve with open shadows (+25), compressed highlights to preserve window detail, gentle S-curve for depth without harshness, matte-like finish avoiding pure blacks
technical_quality.vignette: No vignette or extremely subtle (-5%) to maintain clean, open urban atmosphere
technical_quality.dynamic_range: High dynamic range capture (14+ stops) via exposure bracketing or high-end sensor, preserving detail in dim street areas, bright interior lights, and subtle sky gradations simultaneously
